mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.description, p.type, p.parent_id, p.icon, p.path, p.component, p.sort, p.visible, p.`status`, p.is_deleted, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.STATUS = 1 AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND r.STATUS = 1 AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND u.STATUS = 1 AND u.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.description, p.type, p.parent_id, p.icon, p.path, p.component, p.sort, p.visible, p.`status`, p.is_deleted, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} and p.type = #{type} AND p.STATUS = 1 AND p.is_deleted = 0 AND r.STATUS = 1 AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND u.STATUS = 1 AND u.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort
